## IStorage.canResolve() method

Returns true if the URI is resolvable by the current storage interface.

For example: If the storage is configured to point to IPFS, passing in ipfs://SOME\_HASH will return true in this function because that is a valid IPFS URI.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
canResolve(uri: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  uri | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
